Okay when i was in Fayetteville Stacey ( Johns sister) offered me a job babysitting Ethan ( John's 2 1/2 yr old nephew) and i would stay there for the 4 months that i am taking of off school. When i got back.. mom and i talked about that and we were both a little ify about it. But today i get the new paper and there are 2 major hotel hiring and i am going to apply to them this weekend. Mom went to the beach and when she came back she told me that she did some thinking. and she told me that It's stupid that i haven't been able to find a job yet ( stupid that no one is hiring) and she said that if i apply to these otehr places and they call me back theni should just go to Faetteville and babaysitt Ethan becuasei would at least be making money rather than sitting around making no money. She aslo said that i need to decide by the time we get from MI ( we leave next week) and if i dont get a call back by then .. then i should just go to Fayetteville and work for Stacey. and if i end up going i could leave at the end of august which is when Jill and Aunt Dee leave here (they are coming for a visit) so i would be there from August-December/January. What should i do?

Pro's

1. Make money

2. Live with John for 4 months

3. Babysitt a little boy that loves me

4. get out of the house

 

Con's

1. Mom alone for 4 months

2. Won't be here for the holidays ( again)

3.Mom alone for hurricane season

4.Is the pay enough?


P.S Mom told me to just do it and not to worry about her being alone because i will be moving out anyway. she said " it will be weird with out you here but i would rather you be makingmoney and doing something VS. not makingmoney and just sitting around".

The Keys to Your Heart

You are attracted to good manners and elegance.
In love, you feel the most alive when your lover is creative and never lets you feel bored.
You'd like to your lover to think you are stylish and alluring.
You would be forced to break up with someone who was insecure and in constant need of reassurance.
Your ideal relationship is comforting. You crave a relationship where you always feel warmth and love.
Your risk of cheating is zero. You care about society and morality. You would never break a commitment.
You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred.
In this moment, you think of love as something you thirst for. You'll do anything for love, but you won't fall for it easily.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?
Your Seduction Style: The Charmer
You're a master at intimate conversation and verbal enticement. You seduce with words, by getting people to open up to you. By establishing this deep connection quickly, people feel under your power. And then you've got them exactly where you want them!
What Is Your Seduction Style?

I got this poem from my Criminal Justice teacher last year and it really made me appritiate what the men and women in Law enforcement and emergency services do for us every day!  I hope you gain teh same respect that I did..


" I Want To Tell You Lies"

I want to tell that little boy , that his mom will be just fine
I want to tell that dad, we got his daughter out in time.
I want to tell that wife; her husband will be home tonight
I don't want to tell it like it is, I want to tell them lies.
You didn't put their seatbelts on; you feel you killed your kids.
I don't want to say you didn't.....but in a way you did.
You pound your fists into my chest; your hurting so inside.
I want to say you'll be OK, i want tell you lies.

You left chemicals within his reach, nd it's in his eyes.
I want to say your son will see, not tell you he'll be blind.
you ask me if he'll be OK , with pleading in your eyes
I wan to say that yes he will, i want to tell you lies.

I can see you're crying, as your life goes up in smoke.
Id you'd maintained that smoke alarm, your childrean would have awoke.
Don't grab my arm and ask me if your family is alive.
Don't make me tell you they're all dead, I want to tell you lies.

I want to say she'll be OK, you didn't take her life.
I hear you say you love her and you'd never hurt your wife.
You thought you didn't drink to much, you thought that  you could drive.
I don't want to say how wrong you were, I want to tell you lies.

You only left her for a moment, it hapens all the time.
How could she have fell from there? You thought she couldn't climb.
I want to say her neck's not broke, that she will be just fine.
I don't want to say she's paralized, I want to tell you lies.

He fell into the pool, when you just went to grab the phone.
it was only for a second, that you left him there alone.
if you let that darn phone ring, perhaps your boy would be alive,
But I don't want to tell you that, I want to tell you lies.

I want to tell this treen, his buddies didn't die in vain.
Because he thought that it'd be cool, to try and beat that train.
I don't want to tell him this will haunt him all his life.
I want to say that he'll forget, I want to tell him lies.

The fact that you were speeding, caused that car to overturn.
And we couldn't get them out of there, before the whole thing burned.
Did they suffer? Yes, they suffered, as they slowly burned alive.
But I don't want to say those words, I want to tell you lies.

But I have to tell it like it is, until my shift is through.
And then the real lies begin, when I come home to you.
you ask me how my day was, and I say it was just fine.
I hope you undertsnad, sometimes I have to tell you lies.

 Author unknown

Dedicated to all of the Police Officers, EMT's, Paramedics, Firefighters, Nurses, Victims Assitance and Emergency Flight Crews



God bless all of you!

In the blink of an eye you see your life flash by....
Never knowing if you did what you wanted to or tried something new or exciting. 
You let that thought of regret haunt you for as long as you can remember....
Blind to any solution to any of your problems or road blocks....
Not realizing the simplicity of it all..
The only thing you need to do is to let it go....
Let it go by not allowing it to get that far...
Do everything you have ever wanted to do.. 
Try new things...
Meet new people..
Fall in love or Fall out of love....
But most of all, do what you know will make you happy and not regret never living.

I take it to heart that living every moment of everyday keeps regreat away. You don't want to be 78 and think .. I wish i could of gne sky diving when i given the chance.. you know i wish i would have talked to that kid back in high school.. or i wish i would of had a better relationship with my parents or siblings. Do what you can now, while you have the time to do it. And keep in mind that if you judge someone you have no time to love them.

Keep on keepin on....

I love you granny!

I went for a speed skate ( to blow off some energy) through the park today. I am so tempted right now to just go sit on the beach and look up at all the stars.  The sky is so amazing here at night, that is a plus about being down here. The sky is just twinkleing with billions of stars. You know how when your a little kid your'e told that if you make a wish on the first star you see , that it will come true... I have been making the same wish on that first star that i see ever since i was younger. and it has yet to come true. Everyday it becomes less and less of a reality as the chances of that wish ever comeing true. My wish was that my dad and i could actually have a relationship again like we did when i was little. I was such a daddies girl. Until i grew up and began to realize what was really going on. Then he grew distant.After my parents divorced my dad moved out and into a house with a family friend who lived about 4 blocks away from me and i never seen him.. he never even called.. i always had to call him.  and its still like that now.. i always have to call him and now im 18 and living 3,000 miles away. All chance of that happening are gone. So now its time for me to mke a new wish.. Maybe i will have better luck the second time around.
